page.contest-access-info: To access a contest, please use the correct contest URL format:
page.url-format-description: Replace '{contest-slug'} with your specific contest identifier.
page.contact-admin: If you don't have a contest URL, please contact your contest administrator.

page.description: You do not have permission to access this page.
The page you are looking for could not be found.
An unexpected error has occurred on the server.
The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

error-page.description: An unexpected error has occurred on the server.

disconnection-alert.listener-disconnected: Connection to server lost. Live updates are unavailable. Attempting to reconnect...

page.title: Sign in
page.subtitle: Enter your credentials to access the contest

submissions-page.page-description: View all submissions made during the contest.
submissions-page.guidance-text: View all contest submissions here. Submissions are judged automatically and results appear in real-time. You can see the status (judging/judged/failed) and answer (accepted/wrong answer/compilation error/runtime error/time limit exceeded/memory limit exceeded) for each submission.

submissions-page-form.create-description: Fill out the form below to create a new submission.

submissions-page-action-rerun.title: Are you sure you want to resubmit?
submissions-page-action-rerun.description: This will send the submission to the judge queue again and may take some time to complete.

submissions-page-action-judge.title: Are you sure you want to judge?
submissions-page-action-judge.description: This will override any existing answer.

submission-form.code-too-large: Code file must be at most 10MB

settings-page.title: Forseti - Settings
settings-page.description: Manage your contest settings and preferences.
settings-page.in-progress-alert-description: This contest is currently in progress. Changing the settings may affect the contest experience for participants.
settings-page.confirm-dialog-description: Are you sure you want to save these changes?
settings-page.confirm-dialog-in-progress-alert-descrip: This contest is currently in progress. Changing the settings may affect the contest experience for participants. Please review your changes carefully before confirming.

settings-page-problems-tab.description-description: The problem description file in PDF format.
settings-page-problems-tab.time-limit-description: The maximum time allowed for the problem.
settings-page-problems-tab.memory-limit-description: The maximum memory allowed for the problem.
settings-page-problems-tab.test-cases-description: The test cases file in CSV format with two columns: input and expected output.

settings-page-contest-tab.slug-description: The slug is used in the URL and must be unique.
settings-page-contest-tab.start-at-description: The start time of the contest.
settings-page-contest-tab.end-at-description: The end time of the contest.
settings-page-contest-tab.languages-description: The programming languages allowed in the contest.
settings-page-contest-tab.is-auto-judge-enabled-description: Whether to enable auto judging of submissions.
settings-page-contest-tab.force-start-confirmation-title: Are you sure you want to force the contest to start immediately?
settings-page-contest-tab.force-start-error: Failed to force start the contest.
settings-page-contest-tab.force-end-confirmation-title: Are you sure you want to force the contest to end immediately?
settings-page-contest-tab.force-end-error: Failed to force end the contest.

settings-form.slug-too-long: Slug must be at most 32 characters long
settings-form.slug-pattern: Slug must only contain alphanumeric characters and hyphens
settings-form.title-too-long: Title must be at most 255 characters long
settings-form.languages-required: At least one language is required
settings-form.start-future: Start date must be in the future
settings-form.end-after-start: End date must be after start date
settings-form.auto-freeze-after-start: Auto freeze date must be after start date
settings-form.auto-freeze-before-end: Auto freeze date must be before end date
settings-form.auto-freeze-future: Auto freeze date must be in the future
settings-form.problem-title-too-long: Title must be at most 255 characters long
settings-form.problem-description-size: Description file must be at most 10MB
settings-form.problem-time-limit-positive: Time limit must be a positive number
settings-form.problem-memory-limit-positive: Memory limit must be a positive number
settings-form.problem-test-cases-size: Test cases file must be at most 10MB
settings-form.problem-test-cases-format: Test cases file must be in CSV format
settings-form.member-name-too-long: Name must be at most 64 characters long
settings-form.member-login-too-long: Login must be at most 32 characters long
settings-form.member-password-too-long: Password must be at most 32 characters long

problems-page.page-description: View all problems for the contest.
problems-page.guidance-text: Here you can view all contest problems. Click the PDF button to download problem statements. Time and memory limits are displayed for each problem.

leaderboard-page.rules-explanation: Rankings are determined by: 1) Total problems solved (more is better); 2) Total penalty time (less is better); 3) Time of accepted submissions (earlier is better); 4) Name (alphabetical). Penalty includes submission time plus 20 minutes for each wrong answer before acceptance.

clarifications-page.page-description: View and request clarifications for contest problems.
clarifications-page.empty-description: Clarifications will appear here once requested.
clarifications-page.guidance-text: Use this page to ask questions about contest problems and view official responses from judges. All clarifications and answers are visible to all contestants to ensure fairness. Ask specific questions about problem statements, input/output formats, or edge cases.

clarifications-page-form.create-description: Submit a new clarification request for a contest problem or a general question.

clarifications-page-card.delete-alert-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the clarification.

announcements-page.empty-description: Announcements will appear here once created.
announcements-page.guidance-text: This page displays important contest announcements from judges and organizers. Announcements may include contest updates, clarifications that affect all contestants, schedule changes, or other important information.

announcements-page-form.create-description: Write and broadcast a new announcement to all participants.
